flawed_nl_solution:
Working out the difference between the amount of wood available at the start and the end of the day shows that 10 bundles - 3 bundles = <<10-3=11>>11 bundles of wood have been burned throughout the day.
Subtracting the wood burned in the morning from this shows that 11 bundles - 4 bundles = <<11-4=7>>7 bundles of wood were burned in the afternoon.
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
